channel.title: Thelegend317 - Instant Pking || Skilling || 24/7
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.thelegend317.com/forums/Themes/urban_20rc5/images/custom/logo.png[/img] Welcome to Thelegend317 i made a thread yesterday looking for beta testers and the few people that did come on loved the server and the pking aspect of it. i am now opening the server for everyone to come and join!
Play now - [url=http://thelegend317.com/webclient]Play Thelegend317[/url] Forums - [url=http://thelegend317.com/]Thelegend317 Forums[/url] Desktop client - [url=http://www.thelegend317.com/webclient/client.jar]Download desktop client[/url]
Instead of boring you with a long list of features i made a long Gif Image to show you most of the features this server comes with. The following Gif is a long one so watch it completely. [img]http://i.imgur.com/0ZDpW.gif[/img] Perfect Switching [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hfzQM.gif[/img]
I will be Updating This Thread as the server progresses.[/center]
